mean_cn: adj. 反抗的，造反的，难控制的
mean_en: refusing to obey rules or authority or to accept normal standards of behavior, dress, etc. :having or showing a tendency to rebel
word_etyma: re反+bell打+ious形容词后缀→反抗的，难控制的
sentence: The boy turned rebellious when his father stopped giving him money.
sentence_trans: 当这个男孩的父亲停止给他零花钱的时候，他变得非常的反抗。
